title: 安装SAO Mod后崩溃
author: 残响之N菌
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-5-27 16:06 编辑 

喜欢SAO 但不能玩(?；ω；`)
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.

Time: 5/27/16 8:51 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.tencao.saoui.SAOMod

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
残响之N菌 发表于 2016-5-28 10:03
请问，有什么办法能解决么？
更新mod/更换稳定版本/删除

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
saoui{1.4} [Sword Art Online UI] (saoui-1.7.10-1.4a.jar) 
这个mod导致的崩溃

感谢帮助~
